com.smartthings.sdk.smartapp.core.extensions.contextstore

Interface InstalledAppContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultInstalledAppContext

    public interface InstalledAppContext
    This interface represents the context of an installed application. More than likely, you will just want to use DefaultInstalledAppContext. If you want to add your own data to the context store, you will need to: 1) extend DefaultInstalledAppContext or implement this interface directly 2) create your own InstalledAppContextStore implementation
